div.p: Color in the SD74 logo, display it in your home, take a picture next to your work, email the picture to caudisho@sd74.org, check our Twitter feed (@lincolnwoodsd74) for your photo! Click on the headline to access the logo.

SD74 Students, Families & Community: this year's Lincoln Hall spring musical, Aladdin Jr., is cancelled. We will truly miss watching our students perform and showcase their talent on stage. Stay safe & healthy, Jaguars.

a.title: Go to comments for Lincoln Hall Spring Musical Cancelled

div.p: Click on the headline to purchase 2019-20 school yearbooks.

a.title: Go to comments for School Yearbooks

div.p: 16 translators are available to provide translation services in 19 different languages to families seeking assistance in their native languages. Click on the headline to learn more.

a.title: Go to comments for Language Translation Program
